item.title: Words and sentences: names of bones
item.summary: Names for certain bones, etc. (L VIII.-16. 7401 and 7402). |xam names and descriptions of various bones and tendons (found in animals).
item.comments: 1) p.7401v: (15 September 1878) the ligament found under the springbok's knee is called |kueten, 2) This story is found in Book VIII-16
item.author: |hanâ‰ kass'o (Klein Jantje) (VIII)
